panels.description: Candlestick chart displaying Open, High, Low, Close prices and trading Volume for the selected ticker symbol

targets.query:
SELECT 
    time,
    ticker,
    open,
    high,
    low,
    close,
    volume
FROM ohlcv
WHERE ticker = '$symbol'
  AND time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
ORDER BY time
targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    time,
    ticker,
    open,
    high,
    low,
    close,
    volume
FROM ohlcv
WHERE ticker = '$symbol'
ORDER BY time DESC;

SELECT price as entry,
  time
FROM "$strategy"
WHERE hash_id = '$hash_id'
  AND backtest_id = '$backtest_id'
  AND ticker = '$symbol'
  AND action = 'buy_to_open'
  AND time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
ORDER BY time DESC;

SELECT price as exit,
  time
FROM "$strategy"
WHERE hash_id = '$hash_id'
  AND backtest_id = '$backtest_id'
  AND ticker = '$symbol'
  AND action = 'sell_to_close'
  AND time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
ORDER BY time DESC;

panels.title: $symbol OHLCV

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  *
FROM "$strategy"
WHERE hash_id = '$hash_id'
  AND backtest_id = '$backtest_id'
  AND ticker = '$symbol'
  AND time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
LIMIT 1

targets.query:
WITH fills AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    action,
    price,
    shares,
    side,
    commission,
    time,
    ticker
  FROM "$strategy"
  WHERE hash_id = '$hash_id'
    AND backtest_id = '$backtest_id'
    AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
    AND time >= $__timeFrom
    AND time <= $__timeTo
    AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
    AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')
),
trade_aggregates AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    MAX(side) as side,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('buy_to_open', 'sell_to_open') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as entry_value,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as exit_value,
    SUM(commission) as total_commission,
    MAX(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN time END) as exit_time
  FROM fills
  GROUP BY trade_id
),
trade_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    exit_time as time,
    CASE 
      WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN exit_value - entry_value - total_commission
      ELSE entry_value - exit_value - total_commission
    END as pnl,
    CASE 
      WHEN entry_value > 0 THEN 
        CASE 
          WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN (exit_value - entry_value - total_commission) / entry_value * 100.0
          ELSE (entry_value - exit_value - total_commission) / entry_value * 100.0
        END
      ELSE NULL
    END as return_pct
  FROM trade_aggregates
  WHERE exit_time IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  time,
  SUM(return_pct) OVER (ORDER BY time) as cumulative_return_pct
FROM trade_metrics
ORDER BY time
targets.rawSql:
WITH fills AS (
  SELECT 
    action,
    commission,
    price,
    shares,
    side,
    time,
    trade_id,
    hash_id,
    backtest_id
  FROM "$strategy"
  WHERE hash_id = '$hash_id'
    AND backtest_id = '$backtest_id'
    AND ticker = '$symbol'
    AND time >= $__timeFrom
    AND time <= $__timeTo
),
trade_aggregates AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    MAX(side) as side,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('buy_to_open', 'sell_to_open') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as entry_value,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as exit_value,
    SUM(commission) as total_commission,
    MAX(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN time END) as exit_time
  FROM fills
  GROUP BY trade_id
),
trade_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    exit_time as time,
    CASE 
      WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN exit_value - entry_value - total_commission
      ELSE entry_value - exit_value - total_commission
    END as pnl,
    CASE 
      WHEN entry_value > 0 THEN 
        CASE 
          WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN (exit_value - entry_value - total_commission) / entry_value * 100.0
          ELSE (entry_value - exit_value - total_commission) / entry_value * 100.0
        END
      ELSE NULL
    END as return_pct
  FROM trade_aggregates
  WHERE exit_time IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  time,
  SUM(return_pct) OVER (ORDER BY time) as cumulative_return_pct
FROM trade_metrics
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  action,
  commission,
  price,
  shares,
  side,
  time,
  trade_id,
  hash_id,
  backtest_id
FROM "$strategy"
WHERE hash_id = '$hash_id'
  AND backtest_id = '$backtest_id'
  AND ticker = '$symbol'
  AND time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
ORDER BY trade_id ASC;

targets.query:
WITH fills AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    action,
    price,
    shares,
    side,
    commission,
    time,
    ticker
  FROM "$strategy"
  WHERE hash_id = '$hash_id'
    AND backtest_id = '$backtest_id'
    AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
    AND time >= $__timeFrom
    AND time <= $__timeTo
    AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
    AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')
),
trade_aggregates AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    MAX(side) as side,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('buy_to_open', 'sell_to_open') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as entry_value,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as exit_value,
    SUM(commission) as total_commission
  FROM fills
  GROUP BY trade_id
),
trade_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN exit_value - entry_value - total_commission
      ELSE entry_value - exit_value - total_commission
    END as pnl
  FROM trade_aggregates
  WHERE exit_value > 0
)
SELECT
  AVG(pnl) as avg_return
FROM trade_metrics

    AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')

trade_aggregates AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    MAX(side) as side,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('buy_to_open', 'sell_to_open') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as entry_value,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as exit_value,

trade_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN entry_value > 0 THEN 
        CASE 
          WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN (exit_value - entry_value - total_commission) / entry_value * 100.0
          ELSE (entry_value - exit_value - total_commission) / entry_value * 100.0
        END
      ELSE NULL
    END as return_pct
  FROM trade_aggregates
  WHERE exit_value > 0 AND entry_value > 0
)
SELECT
  AVG(return_pct) as avg_return_pct
FROM trade_metrics

targets.query:
WITH fills AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    action,
    price,
    shares,
    side,
    commission,
    time,
    ticker
  FROM "$strategy"
  WHERE hash_id = '$hash_id'
    AND backtest_id = '$backtest_id'
    AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
    AND time >= $__timeFrom
    AND time <= $__timeTo
    AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
    AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')
),
trade_aggregates AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    MAX(side) as side,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('buy_to_open', 'sell_to_open') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as entry_value,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as exit_value,
    SUM(commission) as total_commission
  FROM fills
  GROUP BY trade_id
),
trade_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN exit_value - entry_value - total_commission
      ELSE entry_value - exit_value - total_commission
    END as pnl
  FROM trade_aggregates
  WHERE exit_value > 0
)
SELECT
  (COUNT(CASE WHEN pnl > 0 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)) as win_percentage
FROM trade_metrics

WITH fills AS (
  SELECT 
    action,
    commission,
    price,

  FROM "$strategy"
  WHERE hash_id = '$hash_id'

    AND ticker = '$symbol'
    AND time >= $__timeFrom
    AND time <= $__timeTo
),
trade_aggregates AS (

    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('buy_to_open', 'sell_to_open') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as entry_value,

    SUM(commission) as total_commission
  FROM fills

),
trade_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN exit_value - entry_value - total_commission
      ELSE entry_value - exit_value - total_commission
    END as pnl
  FROM trade_aggregates
  WHERE exit_value > 0
)
SELECT
  (COUNT(CASE WHEN pnl > 0 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)) as win_percentage
FROM trade_metrics

targets.query:
WITH fills AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    action,
    price,
    shares,
    side,
    commission,
    time,
    ticker
  FROM "$strategy"
  WHERE hash_id = '$hash_id'
    AND backtest_id = '$backtest_id'
    AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
    AND time >= $__timeFrom
    AND time <= $__timeTo
    AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
    AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')
),
trade_aggregates AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    MAX(side) as side,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('buy_to_open', 'sell_to_open') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as entry_value,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as exit_value,
    SUM(commission) as total_commission
  FROM fills
  GROUP BY trade_id
),
trade_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN exit_value - entry_value - total_commission
      ELSE entry_value - exit_value - total_commission
    END as pnl
  FROM trade_aggregates
  WHERE exit_value > 0
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN pnl < 0 THEN ABS(pnl) ELSE 0 END) > 0
    THEN ROUND(
      SUM(CASE WHEN pnl > 0 THEN pnl ELSE 0 END) /
      SUM(CASE WHEN pnl < 0 THEN ABS(pnl) ELSE 0 END),
      2
    )
    ELSE 0
  END as profit_loss_ratio
FROM trade_metrics
targets.rawSql:
WITH fills AS (
  SELECT 
    action,
    commission,
    price,
    shares,
    side,
    time,
    trade_id,
    hash_id,
    backtest_id
  FROM "$strategy"
  WHERE hash_id = '$hash_id'
    AND backtest_id = '$backtest_id'
    AND ticker = '$symbol'
    AND time >= $__timeFrom
    AND time <= $__timeTo
),
trade_aggregates AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    MAX(side) as side,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('buy_to_open', 'sell_to_open') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as entry_value,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as exit_value,
    SUM(commission) as total_commission
  FROM fills
  GROUP BY trade_id
),
trade_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN exit_value - entry_value - total_commission
      ELSE entry_value - exit_value - total_commission
    END as pnl
  FROM trade_aggregates
  WHERE exit_value > 0
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN pnl < 0 THEN ABS(pnl) ELSE 0 END) > 0
    THEN ROUND(
      SUM(CASE WHEN pnl > 0 THEN pnl ELSE 0 END) /
      SUM(CASE WHEN pnl < 0 THEN ABS(pnl) ELSE 0 END),
      2
    )
    ELSE 0
  END as profit_loss_ratio
FROM trade_metrics

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT ticker
FROM "$strategy"
ORDER BY ticker
list.label: Symbol
list.name: symbol

query.query:
SELECT DISTINCT ticker
FROM "$strategy"
ORDER BY ticker

list.definition:
SELECT table_name
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
  AND table_name NOT IN (
    'distinct_caches',
    'influxdb_schema',
    'last_caches',
    'parquet_files',
    'processing_engine_logs',
    'processing_engine_trigger_arguments',
    'processing_engine_triggers',
    'queries'
  )
ORDER BY table_name
list.label: Strategy
list.name: strategy

query.query:
SELECT table_name
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
  AND table_name NOT IN (
    'distinct_caches',
    'influxdb_schema',
    'last_caches',
    'parquet_files',
    'processing_engine_logs',
    'processing_engine_trigger_arguments',
    'processing_engine_triggers',
    'queries'
  )
ORDER BY table_name

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT backtest_id FROM "$strategy" WHERE hash_id='$hash_id'
list.label: Backtest ID
list.name: backtest_id

query.query: SELECT DISTINCT backtest_id FROM "$strategy" WHERE hash_id='$hash_id'
